title: Torrent™ Blender – Easy Does It | KitchenAid
description: The revolutionary Torrent™ Blender from KitchenAid® combines high power and high style, so you can make anything from soups to smoothies. It’s easy to use from start to finish, and the pitcher and cap are dishwasher safe. So you can blend more, and work less.

asset.author: KitchenAid

It’s easy to use from start to finish, and the pitcher and cap are dishwasher safe. So you can blend more, and work less. http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/blenders/torrent-blender/
